scripts.test: yarn test:unit && yarn workspace @langchain/core build && yarn workspace langchain build && yarn test:exports:docker
scripts.test:int: yarn run test:int:deps && turbo run test:integration ; yarn run test:int:deps:down
scripts.publish: bash langchain/scripts/release-branch.sh && turbo run --filter langchain build lint test --concurrency 1 && yarn run test:exports:docker && yarn workspace langchain run release && echo 'ðŸ”— Open https://github.com/langchain-ai/langchainjs/compare/release?expand=1 and merge the release PR'
scripts.publish:core: bash langchain/scripts/release-branch.sh && turbo run --filter @langchain/core build lint test --concurrency 1 && yarn run test:exports:docker && yarn workspace @langchain/core run release && echo 'ðŸ”— Open https://github.com/langchain-ai/langchainjs/compare/release?expand=1 and merge the release PR'
